information: Poly-clip System is the world's largest supplier of clip sealing solutions. We have been developing industry-tested and trade-approved packaging solutions for many decades. Our type of packaging is suitable for a wide range of application areas, including both food items (such as sausages and poultry) and non-food items. Our product and service system contains a multitude of innovative solutions, from clip machines to consumables such as clips and loops. We will be happy to offer you tailored advice about your product and demonstrate the advantages of this type of packaging to you. The history of this Germany family-run business, headquartered in Hattersheim, near Frankfurt am Main, dates back to the year 1922. Between then and now we have amassed over 800 patents, which attest to our position as a global technology leader. With an export quota of almost 90%, our clip sealing solutions are used around the world.
keywords: Packing and packaging - machinery and equipment, Labelling systems, salami, packing, Environmentally-friendly packaging
